docs.lead_paragraph: This animation begins with an front view of the urinary tract and continues with the formation of kidney stones shown in a cut-section of the kidney. Severities of kidney stones are depicted, demonstrating various degrees of urine obstruction.
docs.snippet: This animation begins with an front view of the urinary tract and continues with the formation of kidney stones shown in a cut-section of the kidney. Severities of kidney stones are depicted, demonstrating various degrees of urine obstruction.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation illustrates the major structures of the respiratory system and shows the mechanism of breathing (respiration.
docs.snippet: This animation illustrates the major structures of the respiratory system and shows the mechanism of breathing (respiration.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the mechanism of coughing caused by an irritant entering the windpipe (larynx), resulting in its dislodgement. The steps of the coughing reflex are shown from a side view of the body in tandem with a top view of the vocal cords.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the mechanism of coughing caused by an irritant entering the windpipe (larynx), resulting in its dislodgement. The steps of the coughing reflex are shown from a side view of the body in tandem with a top view of the vocal cords.
